articles.author: Liberty Dunworth
articles.title: Daft Punk's Thomas Bangalter explains the reason for their split - NME
articles.description: The musician is venturing away from the electronic sound
articles.content:
Thomas Bangalter has opened up about his career after Daft Punk and explained the reasons behind the duos split.
The musician who founded the French electronic duo with Guy-Manuel de Homem-Christo w… [+2685 chars]
